mapper.insert: insert into zj_address (addr_id, add_time, add_user_id, addr1, addr2, addr3, city_id, county_id, default_flag, delete_flag, name, post_code, province_id, status, tel1, tel2, type_id, update_time, user_id, transaction_id, update_user_id, longitude, latitude, city, county, province) values (#{addrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{addr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{countyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{defaultFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tel1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{transactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update zj_address set add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, add_user_id = #{addUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, addr1 = #{addr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr2 = #{addr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr3 = #{addr3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, default_flag = #{defaultFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_code = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tel1 = #{tel1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel2 = #{tel2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, transaction_id = #{transactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where addr_id = #{addrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select addr_id, add_time, add_user_id, addr1, addr2, addr3, city_id, county_id, default_flag, delete_flag, name, post_code, province_id, status, tel1, tel2, type_id, update_time, user_id, transaction_id, update_user_id, longitude, latitude, city, county, province from zj_address where addr_id = #{addrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
